body: You can speak with outsiders. You gain a +1 trait bonus on all Linguistics checks, and you begin play knowing one of the following languages (in addition to those granted by your race and Intelligence modifier): Abyssal, Aquan, Celestial, Ignan, Infernal, Protean, or Terran.
name: Unintentional Linguist
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Basic Traits/Social Traits/Unintentional Linguist
